sourcesContent:
Login Form using Angular material!!
User Name Password
import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html' }) export class LoginComponent { public forecasts: WeatherForecast[] = []; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { http.get(baseUrl + 'weatherforecast').subscribe(result => { this.forecasts = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } } interface WeatherForecast { date: string; temperatureC: number; temperatureF: number; summary: string; }
